column3: Contractual Clauses not drafted by the EU Commission, e.g. by the Controller
column10: (EDPB Recommendations 01/2020 on Supplementary Measures and Transfer Tools,https://edpb.europa.eu/system/files/2021-06/edpb_recommendations_202001vo.2.0_supplementarymeasurestransferstools_en.pdf)

column3: Binding corporate rules (BCR) are data protection policies adhered to by companies established in the EU for transfers of personal data outside the EU within a group of undertakings or enterprises.
column14: David Hickey, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Certification and its binding or specified mechanisms intended to provide sufficient safeguards for data transfers
column10: (EDPB Recommendations 01/2020 on Supplementary Measures and Transfer Tools,https://edpb.europa.eu/system/files/2021-06/edpb_recommendations_202001vo.2.0_supplementarymeasurestransferstools_en.pdf)

column2: Codes of Conduct for Data Transfers
column3: Codes of Conduct that outline sufficient safeguards for carrying out data transfers
column10: (EDPB Recommendations 01/2020 on Supplementary Measures and Transfer Tools,https://edpb.europa.eu/system/files/2021-06/edpb_recommendations_202001vo.2.0_supplementarymeasurestransferstools_en.pdf)

column3: A legal instrument or tool intended to assist or justify data transfers
column10: (GDPR Art.46,https://eur-lex.europa.eu/eli/reg/2016/679/art_46/pnt_c/oj),(EDPB Recommendations 01/2020 on Supplementary Measures and Transfer Tools,https://edpb.europa.eu/sites/default/files/consultation/edpb_recommendations_202001_supplementarymeasurestransferstools_en.pdf)

column3: Standard contractual clauses adopted by the Commission in accordance with the examination procedure referred to in GDPR Article 93(2)
column14: David Hickey, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Standard data protection clauses adopted by a supervisory authority and approved by the Commission pursuant to the examination procedure referred to in GDPR Article 93(2)
column14: David Hickey, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) are pre-approved clauses by the EU for ensuring appropriate data protection safeguards intended for data transfers from the EU to third countries
column14: David Hickey, Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Supplementary measures are intended to additionally provide safeguards or guarentees to bring the resulting protection in line with EU requirements
column10: (EDPB Recommendations 01/2020 on Supplementary Measures and Transfer Tools,https://edpb.europa.eu/system/files/2021-06/edpb_recommendations_202001vo.2.0_supplementarymeasurestransferstools_en.pdf)
column14: David Hickey, Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit
